i1.name: Warpath
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Hecarim''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}} equal to {{as|{{pp|key=%|12 to 24 for 7|1;3 to 18|formula=12%+2% every 3 levels starting from level 3}} of his {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Hecarim gains bonus attack damage equal to 1;3 to 18 â€’ undefined of his bonus movement speed.
i1.notes:
* ''Warpath's'' '''bonus''' attack damage will adjust itself to any temporary movement speed [[buff|buffs]] and [[debuff]]s '''Hecarim''' is affected by.
** Since this only affects '''bonus''' values '''Hecarim''' will not dip below his regular attack damage if he is {{tip|slow|slowed}} below his '''base''' movement speed.
* The amount of movement speed scaling to '''bonus''' attack damage is refreshed every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

w1.name: Spirit of Dread
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies every second.

While ''Spirit of Dread'' is active, '''Hecarim''' is {{tip|heal|healed}} for 30% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% of 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.25}}% of 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every second.
While Spirit of Dread is active, Hecarim is healed for 30% (+ 2.5% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% (+ 1.25% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against minions and monsters.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20*4 to 60*4}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
w1.notes: * The healing cap against minions accounts for every single one regardless of how many are present and/or affected by ''Spirit of Dread'' at the time of cast.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|22 to 18}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/20.667/19.333/18/16.667/0' and riot's value '22,21,20,19,18' as '22/21/20/19/18'

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 20% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)

r1.name: Onslaught of Shadows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' summons spectral riders and {{tip|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} in the target direction with them, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to and {{tip|sight|revealing}} all enemies in their path for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

Enemies within range of where '''Hecarim''' stops are also made to {{tip|flee}} from him for {{pp|type=distance traveled|0.75 to 2 for 11|0 to 1000}} seconds, also gradually {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by up to 99% over the duration. ''The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is based on how far the affected units are from '''Hecarim''', having no slow at all from very close range.''
The wave of ''spectral riders'' travels through ''Onslaught of Shadows's'' full length, regardless of where '''Hecarim''' himself stops.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim summons spectral riders and dashes with displacement immunity in the target direction with them, dealing magic damage to and revealing all enemies in their path for 2.5 seconds.
Enemies within range of where Hecarim stops are also made to flee from him for 0 to 1000 â€’ undefined seconds, also gradually slowing them by up to 99% over the duration. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is based on how far the affected units are from Hecarim, having no slow at all from very close range.
The wave of spectral riders travels through Onslaught of Shadows's full length, regardless of where Hecarim himself stops.

q1.name: Rampage
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against {{tip|minions}}.

If '''Hecarim''' damages at least one enemy with ''Rampage'', he gains a [[buff]] for 8 seconds, [[stack]]ing up to two times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging hits. The buff increases the damage of ''Rampage'' by 2% {{as|(+ 3% of 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} and reduces the '''base''' cooldown by 1, up to a 4% {{as|(+ 6% of 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} damage increase and a reduction in 2 seconds of the '''base''' cooldown at two stacks.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against minions.
If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with Rampage, he gains a buff for 8 seconds, stacking up to two times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging hits. The buff increases the damage of Rampage by 2% (+ 3% of 100 bonus AD) and reduces the base cooldown by 1, up to a 4% (+ 6% of 100 bonus AD) damage increase and a reduction in 2 seconds of the base cooldown at two stacks.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 208}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Minion damage|{{ap|60*0.6 to 208*0.6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*0.6}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 75% bonus AD)
  • Minion damage: (+ % bonus AD)

e1.name: Devastating Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Hecarim''' becomes {{tip|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|type=time active|key=%|25 to 65 for 13|0 to 3|formula=3.3% '''bonus''' movement speed every 0.25 seconds. ''This is capped at 3 seconds.''}} '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}}} for 4 seconds.

While in effect, '''Hecarim's''' next [[basic attack]] is empowered to have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, gain {{pp|type=distance traveled|50 to 250 for 9|0 to 1200}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}}, and cause him to {{tip|dash}} towards the target's direction, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during '''Hecarim's''' ''dash'', they're {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} {{pp|type=distance traveled|250 to 450 for 9|0 to 1200}} units, {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, and dealt modified {{as|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=distance traveled|key=%|0 to 100 for 9|0 to 1200}}, ending the ability in the process.

''Devastating Charge'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Hecarim's ''' basic attack timer and can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
''Devastating Charge's duration is paused during {{ai|Onslaught of Shadows|Hecarim}}.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Hecarim becomes ghosted and gains 0 to 3 â€’ undefined bonus movement speed for 4 seconds.
While in effect, Hecarim's next basic attack is empowered to have an uncancelable windup, gain 0 to 1200 â€’ undefined bonus range, and cause him to dash towards the target's direction, revealing them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during Hecarim's dash, they're knocked back 0 to 1200 â€’ undefined units, stunned for 0.25 seconds, and dealt modified physical damage, increased by 0 to 1200 â€’ undefined, ending the ability in the process.
Devastating Charge resets Hecarim's basic attack timer and can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage.
Devastating Charge's duration is paused during Onslaught of Shadows.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 110}} {{as|(+ 55% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|30*2 to 110*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|55*2}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.notes:
* '''Hecarim''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]] while {{tip|dash|dashing}}.
** {{ai|Onslaught of Shadows|Hecarim}} will interrupt the dash.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} {{tip|stacks multiplicatively}} with other sources of movement speed boosts.
* The bonus attack range stacks additively with {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
* ''Devastating Charge'' will still apply its effects to the target even if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, but not if he goes into {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Devastating Charge's'' damage will apply {{sti|life steal|link=true}} and will affect structures.
* ''"Distance traveled"'' can be simple movement as well as {{tip|dash|dashing}} and {{tip|blink|blinking}}.
* ''Devastating Charge's'' damage will not bypass {{tip|block}} or {{tip|dodge}} but the {{tip|airborne|knock back}} will still be applied.
** ''Devastating Charge'' will still deal damage while {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Hecarim''' loses the {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}} from ''Devastating Charge''.
** '''Hecarim''' will not use the empowered attack while {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* The {{tip|dash}} does not follow targets. The target's position at the time of the enhanced attack is the direction '''Hecarim''' will leap to.
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|20 to 16}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/18.667/17.333/16/14.667/0' and riot's value '20,19,18,17,16' as '20/19/18/17/16'

effects.str:
• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ 55% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Physical Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
